title: EP. 95 Pistol Pete
itunes:title: EP. 95 Pistol Pete
description:
This episode we have special guest Pistol Pete repping for the Terror Squad where he spoke about his experience working in the industry, trauma and anxiety from prison, modern day racism, the late great Big Pun and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
